command.text:
select "schregacdmic"."regacdmic" "regacdmic" ,"schregacdmic"."transdate" "transdate" ,"schregacdmic"."acdcode" "acdcode" ,"acd"."AcademicYear" "acdAcademicYear" ,"acdGlFinperiod"."Fin_period_info" "acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info" ,"acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber"."Acc_Nm" "acdGlFinperiodaccountnumberAcc_Nm" ,"schregacdmic"."schtrnsid" "schtrnsid" ,"schtrns"."schtrnsDesc" "schtrnsschtrnsDesc" ,"schregacdmic"."StudentCode" "StudentCode" ,"Student"."SchstCivilidnumber" "StudentSchstCivilidnumber" ,"Student"."FirstName1" "FirstName1" ,"Student"."FirstName2" "FirstName2" ,"Studentarea"."Desc1" "StudentareaDesc1" ,"Studentbranch"."Desc1" "StudentbranchDesc1"
,"Studentbranchsgm"."sgm_Nm" "Studentbranchsgmsgm_Nm" ,"StudentbranchGender"."Gender" "StudentbranchGenderGender" ,"Studentbranchstage"."ShortDesc1" "StudentbranchstageShortDesc1" ,"Studentbranchschtyp"."schtypDesc" "StudentbranchschtypschtypDesc" ,"StudentCntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "StudentCntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"StudentGender"."Gender" "StudentGenderGender" ,"StudentReligion"."Reljan_nm" "GradeStageShortDesc1" ,"schregacdmic"."Class" "Class" ,"Class"."ClassDesc1" "ClassClassDesc1" ,"schregacdmic"."schstatus_code" "schstatus_code" ,"schstatus_"."schstatus_name" "schstatus_schstatus_name" ,"schregacdmic"."schstudenttypid" "schstudenttypid" ,"schstudenttyp"."schstudenttyp" "schstudenttypschstudenttyp" ,"schregacdmic"."Cntry_No1" "Cntry_No1" ,"Cntry_No1"."Cntry_Nm" "Cntry_No1Cntry_Nm" ,"schregacdmic"."Cntry_No2" "Cntry_No2" ,"Cntry_No2"."Cntry_Nm" "Cntry_No2Cntry_Nm" ,"schregacdmic"."state" "state" ,"state"."State_Nm" "stateState_Nm" "socialstatusschsocialstatuscaseDesc" ,"schregacdmic"."id" "id" ,"Theid"."name_1" "Theidname_1" ,"schregacdmic"."schsthlthcaseid" "schsthlthcaseid" ,"schsthlthcase"."schsthlthcaseDesc" "schsthlthcaseschsthlthcaseDesc" ,"schregacdmic"."studentsefa" "studentsefa" ,"studentsefa"."studentsefaar" "studentsefastudentsefaar" ,"studentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_Nm" "studentsefadebitaccountAcc_Nm" ,"studentsefadebitaccountClsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "studentsefadebitaccountClsacc_Acc_Nm" ,"studentsefadebitaccountAcc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "studentsefadebitaccountAcc_BndAcc_Nm" "Schtransferid" ,"schregacdmic"."joindate" "joindate" ,"schregacdmic"."classorder" "classorder" ,"schregacdmic"."scucessflag" "scucessflag" ,"schregacdmic"."approved" "approved" ,"schregacdmic"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy"
,"schregacdmic"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"schregacdmic"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy"
,"schregacdmic"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" from "dbo"."schregacdmic" "schregacdmic" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "acd" on "schregacdmic"."acdcode" = "acd"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "acdGlFinperiod" on "acd"."GlFinperiodID" = "acdGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber" on "acdGlFinperiod"."accountnumber" = "acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."schtrnstype" "schtrns" on "schregacdmic"."schtrnsid" = "schtrns"."schtrnsid" left join "dbo"."SchStudent" "Student" on "schregacdmic"."StudentCode" = "Student"."StudentCode" left join "dbo"."schArea" "Studentarea" on "Student"."area" = "Studentarea"."Code" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Studentbranch" on "Student"."branch" = "Studentbranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Studentbranchsgm" on "Studentbranch"."sgm" = "Studentbranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "StudentbranchGender" on "Studentbranch"."Genderid" = "StudentbranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Studentbranchstage" on "Studentbranch"."stagecode" = "Studentbranchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "Studentbranchschtyp" on "Studentbranch"."schtypid" = "Studentbranchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "StudentCntry_" on "Student"."Cntry_No" = "StudentCntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "StudentGender" on "Student"."Genderid" = "StudentGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "StudentReligion" on "Student"."Religion" = "StudentReligion"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyState" "Studentstate" on "Student"."state" = "Studentstate"."State" left join "dbo"."reg_other_schools" "Studentid" on "Student"."id" = "Studentid"."id" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "Studentacd" on "Student"."acdcode" = "Studentacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "StudentacdGlFinperiod" on "Studentacd"."GlFinperiodID" = "StudentacdGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."schClassConfig" "StudentClass" on "Student"."Class" = "StudentClass"."classcode" left join "dbo"."Schclasskindlist" "StudentSchclasskind" on "Student"."Schclasskindid" = "StudentSchclasskind"."Schclasskindid" left join "dbo"."schFather" "StudentFather" on "Student"."FatherCode" = "StudentFather"."FatherCode" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "StudentFatherMaritalStatus" on "StudentFather"."MaritalStatus" = "StudentFatherMaritalStatus"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schArea" "StudentFatherarea" on "StudentFather"."area" = "StudentFatherarea"."Code" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "StudentFatherCntry_" on "StudentFather"."Cntry_No" = "StudentFatherCntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "StudentFatherreligion" on "StudentFather"."religion" = "StudentFatherreligion"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyState" "StudentFatherState" on "StudentFather"."State" = "StudentFatherState"."State" left join "dbo"."SchFatherjob" "StudentFatherjob_" on "StudentFather"."job_no" = "StudentFatherjob_"."job_no" left join "dbo"."schGrade" "StudentGrade" on "Student"."GradeCode" = "StudentGrade"."GradeCode" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "StudentGradeacd" on "StudentGrade"."acdcode" = "StudentGradeacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."schStage" "StudentGradeStage" on "StudentGrade"."StageCode" = "StudentGradeStage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schMother" "StudentMother" on "Student"."MotherCode" = "StudentMother"."MotherCode" left join "dbo"."schArea" "StudentMotherarea" on "StudentMother"."area" = "StudentMotherarea"."Code" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "StudentMotherCntry_" on "StudentMother"."Cntry_No" = "StudentMotherCntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "StudentMotherreligion" on "StudentMother"."religion" = "StudentMotherreligion"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyState" "StudentMotherState" on "StudentMother"."State" = "StudentMotherState"."State" left join "dbo"."SchMotherjob" "StudentMotherjob_" on "StudentMother"."job_no" = "StudentMotherjob_"."job_no" left join "dbo"."schStage" "StudentStage" on "Student"."Stage" = "StudentStage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schstatus" "Studentschstatus_" on "Student"."schstatus_code" = "Studentschstatus_"."schstatus_code" left join "dbo"."schstclasskinddmg" "Studentschstclasskinddmg" on "Student"."schstclasskinddmgid" = "Studentschstclasskinddmg"."schstclasskinddmgid" left join "dbo"."schstespetialest" "Studentschstspl" on "Student"."schstsplid" = "Studentschstspl"."schstsplid" left join "dbo"."schsthealthcase" "Studentschsthlthcase" on "Student"."schsthlthcaseid" = "Studentschsthlthcase"."schsthlthcaseid" left join "dbo"."Schstudentsefa" "Studentstudentsefa" on "Student"."studentsefa" = "Studentstudentsefa"."studentsefaid" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Studentstudentsefadebitaccount" on "Studentstudentsefa"."debitaccount" = "Studentstudentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."schstudenttyp" "Studentschstudenttyp" on "Student"."schstudenttypid" = "Studentschstudenttyp"."schstudenttypid" left join "dbo"."Schtransferlist" "StudentSchtransfer" on "Student"."Schtransferid" = "StudentSchtransfer"."Schtransferid" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Thebranch" on "schregacdmic"."branch" = "Thebranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Thebranchsgm" on "Thebranch"."sgm" = "Thebranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "ThebranchsgmOpco" on "Thebranchsgm"."OpcoID" = "ThebranchsgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "ThebranchGender" on "Thebranch"."Genderid" = "ThebranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Thebranchstage" on "Thebranch"."stagecode" = "Thebranchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "Thebranchschtyp" on "Thebranch"."schtypid" = "Thebranchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Stage" on "schregacdmic"."Stage" = "Stage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schGrade" "Grade" on "schregacdmic"."GradeCode" = "Grade"."GradeCode" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "Gradeacd" on "Grade"."acdcode" = "Gradeacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "GradeacdGlFinperiod" on "Gradeacd"."GlFinperiodID" = "GradeacdGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."schStage" "GradeStage" on "Grade"."StageCode" = "GradeStage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schClassConfig" "Class" on "schregacdmic"."Class" = "Class"."classcode" left join "dbo"."schstatus" "schstatus_" on "schregacdmic"."schstatus_code" = "schstatus_"."schstatus_code" left join "dbo"."schstudenttyp" "schstudenttyp" on "schregacdmic"."schstudenttypid" = "schstudenttyp"."schstudenttypid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Cntry_No1" on "schregacdmic"."Cntry_No1" = "Cntry_No1"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Cntry_No2" on "schregacdmic"."Cntry_No2" = "Cntry_No2"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyState" "state" on "schregacdmic"."state" = "state"."State" left join "dbo"."schArea" "area" on "schregacdmic"."area" = "area"."Code" left join "dbo"."SchMotherjob" "mothercase" on "schregacdmic"."mothercase" = "mothercase"."job_no" left join "dbo"."SchFatherjob" "fathercase" on "schregacdmic"."fathercase" = "fathercase"."job_no" left join "dbo"."schsocialstatuscase" "socialstatus" on "schregacdmic"."socialstatus" = "socialstatus"."schsocialstatuscaseid" left join "dbo"."reg_other_schools" "Theid" on "schregacdmic"."id" = "Theid"."id" left join "dbo"."schsthealthcase" "schsthlthcase" on "schregacdmic"."schsthlthcaseid" = "schsthlthcase"."schsthlthcaseid" left join "dbo"."Schstudentsefa" "studentsefa" on "schregacdmic"."studentsefa" = "studentsefa"."studentsefaid" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "studentsefadebitaccount" on "studentsefa"."debitaccount" = "studentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "studentsefadebitaccountClsacc_" on "studentsefadebitaccount"."Clsacc_No" = "studentsefadebitaccountClsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "studentsefadebitaccountAcc_Bnd" on "studentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_Bnd" = "studentsefadebitaccountAcc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd"
